dcterms:creator: Timo Sztyler
Heiner Stuckenschmidt
Wolfgang Petrich
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of tracking Activities of Daily Living (ADLs) performed by seven individuals in an IoT-based smart home environment over a period of 14 days, capturing multiple occurrences of different ADLs using wireless and wearable sensors.
dcterms:title: Sztyler et al. Dataset

dcterms:description: This dataset consists of facial images of users captured while they performed different activities, providing information about muscle movements and associated emotional states using the Facial Action Coding System (FACS).
dcterms:title: Goodfellow et al. Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Jack
K. William
dcterms:description: The UK-DALE dataset consists of domestic appliance-level electricity demand and whole house demand data from five UK homes, recorded over a time resolution of six seconds from 2012 to 2015.
dcterms:title: UK Domestic Appliance Level Electricity (DALE) Dataset
